ai-sn49:1-12.1.2_0: There the Buddha said to him:
ai-sn49:1-12.1.3_0: “Mendicants, there are these four right efforts.
ai-sn49:1-12.1.4_0: What are the teachings grouped by four?
ai-sn49:1-12.1.5_0: It’s when a mendicant generates enthusiasm, tries, makes an effort, exerts the mind, and strives so that bad, unskillful qualities don’t arise. ...
ai-sn49:1-12.1.6_0: They generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and strive so that bad, unskillful qualities that have arisen are given up.
ai-sn49:1-12.1.7_0: They generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and strive so that skillful qualities that have not arisen do arise.
ai-sn49:1-12.1.8_0: so that skillful qualities that have arisen remain, are not lost, but increase, mature, and are completed by development.
ai-sn49:1-12.1.9_0: These are the four right efforts.
ai-sn49:1-12.2.1_0: The Ganges river slants, slopes, and inclines to the east.
ai-sn49:1-12.2.2_0: In the same way, a mendicant who develops and cultivates the four right efforts slants, slopes, and inclines to extinguishment.
ai-sn49:1-12.2.3_0: And how does a mendicant who develops the four right efforts slant, slope, and incline to extinguishment?
ai-sn49:1-12.2.4_0: It’s when a mendicant generates enthusiasm, tries, makes an effort, exerts the mind, and strives so that bad, unskillful qualities don’t arise. ...
ai-sn49:1-12.2.5_0: They generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and strive so that bad, unskillful qualities that have arisen are given up.
ai-sn49:1-12.2.6_0: They generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and strive so that skillful qualities that have not arisen do arise.
ai-sn49:1-12.2.7_0: so that skillful qualities that have arisen remain, are not lost, but increase, mature, and are completed by development.
ai-sn49:1-12.2.8_0: That’s how a mendicant who develops and cultivates the four right efforts slants, slopes, and inclines to extinguishment.”
ai-sn49:1-12.2.10_0: The first sub-chapter on the Ganges is finished.
ai-sn49:1-12.3.1_0: (The Linked Discourses on the Ganges should be expanded as in detail.)
ai-sn49:1-12.4.1_0: Six on slanting to the east,
ai-sn49:13-22.1.1_0: and striving , etc., should be expanded in full.
ai-sn49:13-22.2.1_0: The Realized One, footprint, roof peak,
ai-sn49:23-34.1.1_0: “Mendicants, all the hard work that gets done depends on the earth and is grounded on the earth.
ai-sn49:23-34.1.2_0: In the same way, a mendicant develops and cultivates the four right efforts depending on and grounded on ethics.
ai-sn49:23-34.1.3_0: And how does a mendicant develop the four right efforts depending on and grounded on ethics?
ai-sn49:23-34.1.4_0: It’s when a mendicant generates enthusiasm, tries, makes an effort, exerts the mind, and strives so that bad, unskillful qualities don’t arise. ...
ai-sn49:23-34.1.5_0: so that skillful qualities that have arisen remain, are not lost, but increase, mature, and are completed by development.
ai-sn49:23-34.1.6_0: That’s how a mendicant develops and cultivates the four right efforts depending on and grounded on ethics.”
ai-sn49:23-34.1.7_0: In this way, through the power of strength, etc., is to be extra effort,
ai-sn49:23-34.1.9_0: The third sub-chapter on arms is finished.
ai-sn49:23-34.2.2_0: a tree, a pot, and a spike,
ai-sn49:23-34.2.3_0: the sky, and two on clouds,
ai-sn49:35-44.1.3_0: The search for sensual pleasures, for continued existence, and for a spiritual path.
ai-sn49:35-44.1.5_0: The four right efforts should be developed for the direct knowledge, complete understanding, finishing, and giving up of these three searches.
ai-sn49:35-44.1.6_0: What are the teachings grouped by four?
ai-sn49:35-44.1.7_0: It’s when a mendicant generates enthusiasm, tries, makes an effort, exerts the mind, and strives so that bad, unskillful qualities don’t arise. ...
ai-sn49:35-44.1.8_0: so that skillful qualities that have arisen remain, are not lost, but increase, mature, and are completed by development.
ai-sn49:35-44.1.9_0: These four right efforts should be developed for the direct knowledge, complete understanding, finishing, and giving up of these three searches.”
ai-sn49:35-44.1.12_0: The fourth sub-chapter on searching is finished.
ai-sn49:45-54.1.3_0: Desire for rebirth in the realm of luminous form, desire for rebirth in the formless realm, conceit, restlessness, and ignorance.
ai-sn49:45-54.1.4_0: These are the five higher fetters.
ai-sn49:45-54.1.5_0: The four right efforts should be developed for the direct knowledge, complete understanding, finishing, and giving up of these five higher fetters.
ai-sn49:45-54.1.6_0: What are the teachings grouped by four?
ai-sn49:45-54.1.7_0: It’s when a mendicant generates enthusiasm, tries, makes an effort, exerts the mind, and strives so that bad, unskillful qualities don’t arise. ...
ai-sn49:45-54.1.8_0: so that skillful qualities that have arisen remain, are not lost, but increase, mature, and are completed by development.
ai-sn49:45-54.1.9_0: These four right efforts should be developed for the direct knowledge, complete understanding, finishing, and giving up of these five higher fetters.”
ai-sn49:45-54.1.12_0: The fifth sub-chapter on floods is finished.
ai-sn49:45-54.2.4_0: aggregates, and fetters high and low.
ai-sn49:45-54.2.5_0: The Linked Discourses on the Right Efforts is the fifth section.
